name: CreateRetainerInvoice
description:
Create a retainer invoice for a customer.

Use this tool to create a retainer invoice for a customer through Zoho Books. It should be called when you need to generate an invoice requiring advance payment or retaining fees for services or products.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which the retainer invoice is being created.

parameters.name: retainer_invoice_details
parameters.description: Details for the retainer invoice, including customer ID, reference number, date, contact persons, custom fields, notes, terms, location ID, line items, payment options, template ID, and place of supply.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer the retainer invoice has to be created.

reference_number.description: The reference number of the retainer invoice. Max-length [100]

date.description: The date of creation of the retainer invoice.

contact_person_id.description: Unique ID of the Contact Person.

is_email_enabled.description: Used to check if Email communication preference is enabled for the contact person at transaction level.

is_whatsapp_enabled.description: Used to check if WhatsApp communication preference is enabled for the contact person at transaction level.

communication_preference.description: Preferred modes of communication for the contact person at transaction level.

contact_persons_associated.description: Contact Persons associated with the transaction.

index.description: The index of the custom field

show_on_pdf.description: Boolean value to check if the custom field is to be dispplayed on the pdf.

label.description: The label of the custom field.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields for a reatiner invoice.

notes.description: The notes added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information.

terms.description: The terms added below expressing gratitude or for conveying some information.

description.description: The description of the line items. Max-length [2000]

item_order.description: The order of the line item_order

configured.description: Boolean check to see if a payment gateway ahs been configured

additional_field1.description: Paypal payment method. Allowed Values: standard and adaptive

gateway_name.description: Name of the payment gateway associated with the retainer invoice. E.g. paypal, stripe.Allowed Values: paypal, authorize_net, payflow_pro, stripe, 2checkout and braintree

payment_gateways.description: Online payment gateways through which payment can be made.

payment_options.description: Payment options for the retainer invoice, online payment gateways and bank accounts. Will be displayed in the pdf.

template_id.description: ID of the pdf template associated with the retainer invoice.

place_of_supply.description: Place where the goods/services are supplied to. (If not given, place of contact given for the contact will be taken)

parameters.name: ignore_auto_number_generation
parameters.description: Set to true to ignore automatic invoice number generation and manually input the invoice number.

value_schema.description: Ignore auto invoice number generation for this invoice. This mandates the invoice number. Allowed values true and false
